dcterms:description: The ATIS dataset is used for evaluating natural language understanding tasks, particularly in the context of spoken language understanding for task-oriented dialogue systems.

dcterms:description: The SNIPS dataset is utilized for evaluating spoken language understanding systems, particularly focusing on intent detection and slot filling tasks.
dcterms:title: SNIPS
